name: WordPress Google Search
author: SeedProd

sections.description:
Easily setup a full text site search powered by Google.

Normally to setup a Google Custom Search on your site you have to sign up on Google and create the search index. This plugin will do it automatically using Google’s Linked Custom Search Engines

  • View a Live Demo »

Features:

  • Works with any WordPress Theme
  • No need to setup a Google Custom Search
  • No Google account required
  • Search results show up on the default search result page.
  • Just add the “Google Site Search” widget to your theme.
  • Does not replace the default WordPress search. It runs along with it. Use both if you want.

This plugin is built and maintained by SeedProd
sections.installation:
Installation

  1. Click Plugins > Add New > search for WordPress Google Custom Search
  2. Activate the plugin through the Plugins menu in WordPress
  3. Click Appearance > Widgets > Drag the Google Search widget to a widget area.
sections.faq:
• Why are ads showing on my search results?

This is because Google puts ads on search results by default. Read more

  • No search result are displaying

This mean that no pages from you site are in Google index. Learn how to submit your site.
sections.changelog:
1.0.1

  • Fix: If themes uses the_excert hook into that
  • Added a body class

1.0.0

  • Initial Release

short_description: Add a Custom Google Site Search with no setup. Just drag and drop a widget and you're done.
